definition: to rub/to grind/to polish/to sharpen/to wear down/to die out/to waste time/to pester/to insist

sentences.english: Various shortcomings existed for the adoption of slide bearing in the ball mill was analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了球磨机采用滑动轴承存在摩擦阻力大的弊端。

sentences.english: Ball mill is an efficient tool for grinding many materials into fine powder.
sentences.chinese: 球磨机是一种有效的工具磨许多材料成细粉。

sentences.english: In this paper, the small-scale planet style ball mill is applied to manufacture the industrial roseite powder in XinJiang Province.
sentences.chinese: 本研究采用小型行星式球磨机加工新疆工业蛭石粉体。

sentences.english: The design idea and structures of the partial enclosures for bowl mill are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了球磨机局部隔声罩的设计思路和装置结构。

sentences.english: A new kind of material which suitable for manufacturing large scale ball mill liner was successfully researched.
sentences.chinese: 研究成功了一种适合于制造大型球磨机衬板的新材料。

sentences.english: A novel method on loading and adding balls in ball mill is established by accurate ball size theory.
sentences.chinese: 用球径精确化理论改进现有选厂球磨机的装补球方法。

sentences.english: Powder through the discharge grate discharge ball mill grinding cement, complete.
sentences.chinese: 粉状物通过卸料箅板排出，完成水泥球磨机粉磨作业。

sentences.english: Inlet coal mass and load of the pulverizer control loop is regarded single loop.
sentences.chinese: 将给煤量与球磨机负荷控制回路设计成单回路。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the constructional design of bowl mill.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了球磨机负荷智能监控系统的整体结构设计。

sentences.english: Ball grinding machine, AC drive, hydraulic coupler, energy-saving mode.
sentences.chinese: 球磨机，变频器，液力偶合器，节能运行模式。

sentences.english: These experiments provide useful ways to improve the fine grinding rate of ball grinding mill .
sentences.chinese: 探讨了提高球磨机细磨效率的有效方法。

sentences.english: The adjustment process of lead powder ball grinder was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍铅粉球磨机的调试过程。

definition: see 球磨機|球磨机[qiu2 mo2 ji1]
a device for concentrating (a liquid)/a condenser
aggregate (sand or gravel used in concrete 混凝土)
